name: assignments-root
description: Root folder for Recipe App - Full Stack Management

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client/recipeApp"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client/recipeApp
scripts.tsoa:gen: npm run tsoa:routes --prefix server && npm run tsoa:spec --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client/recipeApp
